name: Bali Sunset Dinner Cruise Luxury Tour
description: Bali is an romantic island with beautiful beach area and wellness relax place. This tour are provided 4 day explorer around Bali with all the meals provided. This is the Luxury Private Tour to serve a minimum 2 person to travelling, you won't find it in Lonely Planet. You will visit temples, shopping area, view the active volcano, rice terrace, dinner at beautiful and romantic beach area and having sunset dinner cruise.
